# Morgan Southgate

In the fall of 2017, I will be starting as a Master's Candidate in the Barrington Lab of the Plant Biology Dept, UVM. My research focuses on ecological niche differentiation within the *Adiantum pedatum* complex, a clade of maidenhair ferns, in northeastern North America. 

![Adiantum aleuticum, Browns Ledges, Lowell VT](AleutianMaidenhairFern.jpg)

[Link to Barrington Lab Website](http://www.uvm.edu/~dbarring/DSBpeople.html)
